statements: UPDATE SurveyData SET survey_title = 'Updated Survey Title' WHERE survey_id = 1;

response1
value1
response2
value2
}' WHERE respondent_id = 2;
UPDATE SurveyData SET response_data = '{"q1": "answer1", "q2": "answer2"}' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyData SET survey_questions = '[{"q1": "What is your age?", "q2": "How did you hear about us?"}]', respondent_id = 5 WHERE survey_title = 'Customer Feedback Survey';
UPDATE responses SET response_text='Updated response text' WHERE response_id=1;
UPDATE surveys SET survey_name='New survey name', survey_topic='Updated survey topic' WHERE survey_id=2;
UPDATE responses SET response_text = 'Updated response 1' WHERE response_id = 1;
UPDATE surveys SET survey_topic = 'New topic' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE survey_data SET answer='Yes' WHERE survey_id=1;
UPDATE survey_respondents SET email='info@example.com' WHERE respondent_id=3;
UPDATE survey_data SET respondent_id = 1001, question = 'How satisfied are you with the product?', answer = 'Very satisfied' WHERE survey_id = 1;

UPDATE surveys SET question_count = 10 WHERE survey_id = '628959d9-49d1-4c82-99f0-11f4d526f3f2';

UPDATE survey_data SET question='What is your favorite color?', answer='Blue', created_at='2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE id=1;
